interpretation:
The Capricorn emoji represents the zodiac sign of the same name. Capricorns are known for their ambition, responsible nature, and perseverance. This card is a reminder to focus on your goals and work hard to achieve them, no matter how difficult the journey may be. 

In a reading, the Capricorn card may suggest that you need to take on more responsibility or adopt a more disciplined approach to your work or personal life. It can also indicate that success is within reach if you stay focused and committed to your goals. However, be mindful not to become too rigid or inflexible in your pursuit of success.

Overall, the Capricorn card encourages you to embrace your inner drive and work towards your aspirations with determination and dedication.
